Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Overheat \O`ver*heat"\, v. t. [Cf. {Superheat}.] To heat to excess; to superheat. --Cowper. [1913 Webster]
overheat v 1: get excessively and undesirably hot; "The car engines overheated" 2: make excessively or undesirably hot; "The room was overheated"
